scripts.copy_fonts: shx mkdir -p static/fonts/files && shx cp node_modules/typeface-merriweather/files/* static/fonts/files && shx cp node_modules/typeface-merriweather-sans/files/* static/fonts/files && shx cat node_modules/typeface-merriweather/index.css >> static/fonts/fonts.css && shx cat node_modules/typeface-merriweather-sans/index.css >> static/fonts/fonts.css
scripts.copy_scripts: shx mkdir -p static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper-lite.min.js static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css static/scripts
scripts.copy_icons: shx mkdir -p static/icons/fa && shx cp -R node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/ static/icons/fa && shx cp -R node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/ static/icons/fa
scripts.copy_static: npm run copy_fonts && npm run copy_icons && npm run copy_scripts
